story.text: Steven Cooney is me.  I'm usually at [[Symbol Project]] - Now [[Symbol Wiki]] - [http://symbolwiki.org symbolwiki.org] , which is a collaborative project to produce ideographic characters for development into use as a writing system.  Related articles: [[Heiratic Language]] [[Symbolic User Interface]]

Hey, go ahead and add stuff to [[Symbolic User Interface]] if you like. The glyph engine was something I came up with for [[Katascope Studio]]. It worked. . to some degree but it was more of a user interface mechanism than a true language -- [[Layne Thomas]]
About to head out, but we can discuss all you like in thread mode on [[Symbolic User Interface]]. The page isn't "complete", and a couple rounds of threads would probably help. -- [[Layne Thomas]]

Steven Cooney is me.  I'm usually at [[Symbol Project]] - Now [[Symbol Wiki]] - [http://symbolwiki.org symbolwiki.org] , which is a collaborative project to produce ideographic characters for development into use as a writing system.  Related articles: [[Heiratic Language]] [[Symbolic User Interface]]

Hey, go ahead and add stuff to [[Symbolic User Interface]] if you like. The glyph engine was something I came up with for [[Katascope Studio]]. It worked. . to some degree but it was more of a user interface mechanism than a true language -- [[Layne Thomas]]
About to head out, but we can discuss all you like in thread mode on [[Symbolic User Interface]]. The page isn't "complete", and a couple rounds of threads would probably help. -- [[Layne Thomas]]
